title: Congressional Democrats Want to Take Money from Hardworking Americans to Fund Failed Socialist Policies – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Healthcare	

Issued on:
October 23, 2018
From the Soviet Union to Cuba to Venezuela, wherever true socialism or communism has been adopted, it has delivered anguish and devastation and failure.
						President Donald J. Trump					DESTRUCTIVE ECONOMIC POLICIES: Under socialist economic policies, Americans can expect their incomes to fall and their economic freedom to vanish.“MEDICARE FOR ALL” IS RADICAL AND DANGEROUS: The Democrats’ socialist ”Medicare for All” plan would devastate the American healthcare market and lead to higher taxes.A DUBIOUS LEGACY: Socialist policies have a long legacy of failure across the world.
